availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Native of Oldenburg, Germany. Worked as a farm laborer in Campbell/Kenton County. Involved in an underage drinking case in 1864 in Kenton County.

bibl.p: Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Campbell County, Alexandria, page 4.

Kentucky Wills and Probate Records, Campbell County, Will Books, Volumes D-E. http://search.ancestry.com/cgi-bin/sse.dll?indiv=1&db=USProbateKY&h=150513&tid=&pid=&usePUB=true&usePUBJs=true&rhSource=7163 accessed 05/17/2017.
